contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|number two}} '''Number Two''', '''No. 2''', or similar may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Film== * [[No. 2 (film)|''No. 2'' (film)]], a 2006 New Zealand film, also: ** [[No. 2 (soundtrack)|''No. 2'' (soundtrack)]], the soundtrack to the film * [[Number 2 (Austin Powers)|Number 2 (''Austin Powers'')]], a character from the Austin Powers films ** [[Emilio Largo]], the main antagonist in the [[James Bond]] film [[Thunderball (film)|Thunderball]] (as well as the [[Ian Fleming]] [[Thunderball (novel)|novel of the same name]]. Largo was referred to as "Number Two," in the film, indicating his rank as the second highest-ranking official in [[SPECTRE]]. The Austin Powers character was a parody of the [[SPECTRE#By_Hierarchy|SPECTRE Command Structure]]. * [[Number Two (film)|''Number Two'' (film)]], a 1975 film directed by Jean-Luc Godard ==Television== * [[Number Two (Battlestar Galactica)|Number Two (''Battlestar Galactica'')]] or Leoben Conoy, character from the 2004 TV Series * [[Number Two (The Prisoner)|Number Two (''The Prisoner'')]], a character from the British television series ''The Prisoner'' * Numbuh Two, a character from the animated television series ''[[Codename: Kids Next Door#Characters|Codename: Kids Next Door]]'' ==Music== * [[No. 2 (band)]], an American alternative rock band *''[[NÂ° 2]]'', a 1959 Serge Gainsbourg album * #2, the pseudonym of American musician [[Paul Gray (Slipknot)|Paul Gray]], when performing with Slipknot * "Number Two", from They Might Be Giants's album, ''[[Here Come the 123s]]'' ==Other== * [[2 (number)]], the natural number * No. 2 [[fuel oil]] or No. 2 [[diesel fuel]] * Number two, [[Minor characters from The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy#Number Two|character from ''The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy'']] by Douglas Adams * No. 2, later revealed to be [[Mid Sodor Railway#Stanley|Stanley, an engine from the fictional Mid Sodor Railway]] of Rev. W. Awdry's ''Railway Series'' * No. 2, a slang term for [[defecation]] * "Number two", a term for a [[curveball]] in baseball == See also == * [[2 (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
